name: Pipeline Based CI instead of manually managed jobs
description: Adopt use of Jenkins Pipelines. There is a repo with some useful util methods people can start using in bitbucket: 1spatial_jenkins_pipeline_utils

name: Use automation handles consistently across codebases
description: Adopt consistent use of ids for decorating UI elements to aid automation

name: Nexus as a Single Repository
description: Unify the .NET, Java , Docker and test data artefact storage all in Nexus - single  and backed up source of truth

name: Adopt CD approach for development and test environments
description: And one day production environments. Explore ArgoCD

name: Favour lightweight/microservices architecture
description: Use of microservices; service-event bus , service mesh

name: Think 'bare bones' build infrastucture and build up
Docker as main test and release
ELK stack ( Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana)
